title: Asking about classroom examinations
context: Inquire about the format or date of an upcoming test.

content.bestLine: What's the format of the upcoming test?

neutral.text: How will the test be structured?
Can you tell me about the exam format?
What date is the test scheduled for?
How long will the exam be?
Will the test be multiple choice?
Are there any sample questions available?

formal.text: Could you inform me about the test schedule?
I would appreciate information on the exam format.
What are the details of the upcoming examination?
Please provide me with the test date and time.
How can I prepare for the test?

patterns.template: Can you tell me about the [options]?

dialogs.description: Student asking instructor about test format

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Excuse me, what's the format of the upcoming test?

lines.speaker: Instructor
lines.text: It will be a multiple-choice exam with a few short-answer questions.

lines.speaker: Student 2
lines.text: I think it's scheduled for next Friday.
